name: Ryszard Janicki
content: Home Page of Dr. Ryszard Janicki Dr. Ryszard Janicki Professor, Department of Computing and Software McMaster University, Faculty of Engineering, Office: Room 217, Information Technology BuildingPhone: +1 (905) 525-9140 ext. 23919 E-mail: janicki@mcmaster.ca McMaster Faculty page of Dr.Ryszard Janicki __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Education Dr. Habil., Computer Science, Polish Academy of Sciences, Warsaw, Poland, 1980 Ph.D., Computer Science, Polish Academy of Sciences, Warsaw, Poland, 1977 M.Sc., Applied Mathematics (5 years program), Warsaw University of Technology, Warsaw, Poland, 1975 Research Concurrency: advanced semantics (relational structures, interval orders, etc.) Approximate reasoning, rough sets, rankings and pairwise comparisons Fundamentals of Software Engineering: tabular expressions, trace assertions Mereology: pragmatics and applications Miscellaneous: Algorithms, Applications, Formal Verification, Theoretical Physics, Formal Languages, Data Bases, Modelling Publications All papers (almost) Recent papers (since 2010) Related to research topics Selected Sixteen papers (author choice) Books Former PhD Students Teaching
